main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported over Midway Island involving various descriptions of unidentified flying objects observed between April and May 1958.
interesting points: One object was observed moving at an estimated speed of 600 mph and changed color from blush-white to navy blue., Another object was noted to be round and bright white, moving slowly compared to aircraft and appearing stationary for a time., A cigar-shaped craft exhibiting no visible means of propulsion was reported to be traveling 3-4 times faster than a jet fighter., There were multiple witnesses at the Naval Station, suggesting corroborative accounts of the sightings., One witness describes seeing a bright light moving in a smooth, steady manner unlike any known aircraft.
sighted object: Unidentified flying objects of various shapes and colors
witness description: Various personnel stationed at the Naval Station, including officers and air traffic controllers
